i1.name: Time in a Bottle
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Zilean''' generates {{sti|Experience|{{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|5|2|3.5|5|6|12|1|6|11|16|18}} experience}}}} (does not count towards his own [[Experience (champion)|level up]]) every 5 seconds. ''Time in a Bottle'' is on cooldown when the game starts and becomes disabled when '''Zilean''' reaches level 18.

When the amount stored is enough to level up an allied {{tip|champion}} and '''Zilean''' has been out of combat with enemy {{tip|champions}} and {{tip|turrets}} in the last 10 seconds, he can select a target allied champion to initiate a {{fd|1.2}} second {{tip|channel}} which starts after a {{fd|0.5}}-second [[Channel#Casting Times|cast time]] and is also {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}} if '''Zilean''' enters combat with enemy champions or turrets.
If the channel is {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}}, ''Time in a Bottle'' goes on a 10 second {{sti|cooldown}}, reduced to 1 second if '''Zilean''' interrupted it himself.
A successful channel levels up the target and rewards '''Zilean''' the granted amount of {{sti|{{as|experience}}}} for himself as well.
i1.notes:
* ''Time in a Bottle'' marks allied champions with two circles beneath them; the inner one represents how close they are to leveling up, turning golden when able to activate ''Time in a Bottle'' on them.
* The target allied champion is not required to be out of combat to be leveled up by ''Time in a Bottle'' - only '''Zilean''' is.
* '''Zilean''' only consumes the amount of {{sti|{{as|experience}}}} required to level up an allied champion. He retains the excess for later use.
* The target allied champion is not required to be within range of '''Zilean''' for the channel to complete successfully, it will complete regardless of if they move to a far distance.
* The channel from ''Time in a Bottle'' is not interrupted even if the allied champion suddenly levels up. However, no experience will be granted to either player, and the passive will not go on cooldown.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Zilean''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}:

q1.name: Time Bomb
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Zilean''' throws a ticking time bomb to the target location that {{tip|sight|reveals}} the area and detonates after 3 seconds, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all surrounding enemies.

''Time Bomb'' will attach itself to units hit directly, or those who move within a small radius of its center while it is on the ground, {{tip|sight|revealing}} them if they are an enemy and detonating at their location when the duration ends, or immediately when they die.
''Time Bomb'' detonates immediately if another one attaches itself to the same unit, {{tip|stun|stunning}} all nearby enemies for a short duration.
q1.notes:
* ''Time Bombs'' landing directly on top of multiple units follow a priority order for whom to attach themselves to.
*# Units already carrying a bomb
*# Enemy champions
*# Allied champions
*# Enemy minions
*# Allied minions
* ''Time Bombs'' are not visible to enemies if they attach to an ally that is {{tip|stealth|stealthed}} and vice versa.
* When ''Time Bomb'' snaps onto an enemy, it deals 0 true damage ({{pending for test}}: damage sourcetype?).
** This triggers [[combat status|in-combat]] effects such as drawing {{tip|turret}} aggression and applying {{ii|Elixir of Sorcery}}.
* '''Zilean''' can detonate an enemy counterpart's ''Time Bomb'' by placing his own on the same unit (the first bomb still deals damage).
* ''Time Bomb'' will be dispelled if the holder takes fatal damage and is saved by {{tip|resurrection}} before it explodes.
* ''Time Bomb'' can deal damage to the enemy holder through {{tip|untargetable|untargetablility}}.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will prevent the application of ''Time Bomb'' and it's detonation damage as well as block the {{tip|stun}}, but not it's immediate detonation if the target already has a ''Time Bomb'' on them.

w1.name: Rewind
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Zilean''' reduces {{ais|Time Bomb|Zilean}} and {{ais|Time Warp|Zilean}} {{sti|cooldown|cooldowns}} by 10 seconds each.
w1.notes:
* ''Rewind'' cannot be ranked up at [[Experience (champion)|Level]] 1.
* ''Rewind'' can only be cast when either of his basic abilities are on {{sti|cooldown}}.

e1.name: Time Warp
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Zilean''' bends time around the target champion, {{tip|slow|slowing}} enemies for {{fd|2.5}} seconds or granting allies or himself {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for the same duration.

r1.name: Chronoshift
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Zilean''' places a protective time rune on the target ally {{tip|champion}} or himself, lasting for 5 seconds.

If the target takes {{tip|death|fatal damage}} during that time, they are put in {{tip|stasis}} for 3 seconds and then {{tip|resurrection|resurrected}}, regaining a set amount of {{as|{{sti|health}}}}.
r1.notes:
* ''Chronoshift'' takes precedence over all other revive effects ({{ii|Guardian Angel}}, {{ai|Rebirth|Anivia}}).
* ''Chronoshift'' does not activate if the target is killed by the {{tip|Nexus Obelisk}}.
* The target's screen will have a white tint.
